          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_6b167e0a99c935cf26f5b19ce3bb6cf2c7a801ef</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Ivy leaves</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Efeublätter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Feuilles de lierre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folhas do ivy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fogli del ivy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλα κισσών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hojas de la hiedra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration compares the shape and size of ivy leaves growing on the north (left) and south (right) side of a wall.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">shape</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">size</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">variation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wall</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung vergleicht die Form und Größe 
des Efeus läßt das Wachsen auf dem Norden (nach links) und Süd 
(rechter) Seite einer Wand.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration compare la forme et la taille 
du lierre laisse la croissance du nord (à gauche) et (du bon) côté 
du sud d'un mur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração compara a forma e o tamanho do 
ivy deixa o crescimento no norte (à esquerda) e no lado (direito) sul
de uma parede.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione confronta la figura ed il 
formato del ivy lascia crescere dal nord (a sinistra) e (dal giusto) 
lato del sud di una parete.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση συγκρίνει τη μορφή και το μέγεθος 
των φύλλων κισσών που αυξάνεται από την πλευρά του Βορρά 
(αριστερά) και νότου (δεξιά) ενός τοίχου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración compara la dimensión de una 
variable y la talla de la hiedra deja el crecimiento en el norte (a la
izquierda) y la cara (derecha) del sur de una pared.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Form</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Größe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Variante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">forme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">taille</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">variation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mur</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
